content:
You return to Etra with a small gathering of villagers whom you've converted to Etra's cause.

"Well, would you look at that!" he says, wearing a proud smile. "You're more persuasive than I thought!"

He turns and addresses the gathered villagers. "Everyone, to the Carbon Forge!" and together they march off to find Elder Orlin. You can tell from their enthusiasm that Etra is going to get his way.

Clear Etra with   to speak with him about your current task.

Discard Etra and return HELPING HAND to the collection. Record SPREAD THE WORD on the campaign tracker. Gain the Rousing Speech reward card. Each Ranger may either soothe 2 fatigue, or spend any amount of energy of one aspect to gain that much energy of another aspect.
